Reviews.Title: Great camera. I love it.
Reviews.Author: Mac
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a few weeks ago. It is my first camera like this and I really enjoy it! If you are looking for a good camera this is one you should get. In the kit I got a camera bag that could be just a tad bigger, a memory card that holds over 4,000 pictures, a battery charger that plugs into a wall outlet, also you can take it over sees! A starter kit to clean up the lens and whatever else needs it.it also comes with an adapter to put into the computer. And a memory card holder that holds up to 12 or more cards. And a table tripod. This tripod may not look strong but it is strong.This is a really great deal, I got it when it was on sale but you will steal enjoy it for the price.A great camera to start with.I hope this helped you on seeing the reviews.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.0Mp Resolution
3.0" LCD Monitor
24-720mm Fujinon 30x Optical Zoom Lens
SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card Storage
1280 x 720 HD Video Capture
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4500 Digital Camera (Black). Includes: 16GB Memory Card, Card Reader, Memory Card Wallet, 4 AA Batteries with Charger, Carrying Case & Starter Kit
